rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall aligned with Vastu principles, welcoming positive energy.
An open and airy living room featuring Bohemian decor elements such as vibrant textiles and natural wood finishes.
A warm dining space adjoining the living area, designed with a Bohemian flair.
Modern yet traditional kitchen space featuring ample storage and natural lighting, aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Private master bedroom designed with Bohemian aesthetics and serene ambiance, ideal for rest.
Cozy guest bedroom with Bohemian accents, ensuring comfort and style.
A quiet library space dedicated to reading and relaxation, with ample shelving and comfortable seating.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.

openings.location: Throughout the house, especially in living and bedrooms
openings.description: Large windows to allow natural light, positioned per Vastu recommendations.
An opening that connects the courtyard to a central swimming pool area, ensuring seamless integration with the outdoor living space.

courtyard.location: Center of the ground floor plan
courtyard.description: A central open courtyard that serves as a transitional space connecting various rooms and fostering natural ventilation.
